mapper.select: select userid, intro, care_type, child_age, activity_type, teacher_type, desired_wage, pic, cctv, hit, round((sysdate - last_edit) *1440) as last_edit, area1, area2, area3, active from teacher where userid=#{userid}

mapper.update: update teacher set intro = #{intro}, last_edit = sysdate where userid = #{userid}

update teacher set care_type= #{care_type}, last_edit = sysdate where userid= #{userid}

mapper.select: select exp_no, exp_content, to_char(exp_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as exp_start, to_char(exp_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as exp_end, case when DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(exp_content, DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(exp_content))is null then '1' else '0' end PRIORITY from experience where userid= #{userid} order by PRIORITY asc, exp_start desc
mapper.update: update experience set exp_content=#{exp_content}, exp_start=#{exp_start}, exp_end=#{exp_end} where userid= #{userid} and exp_no=#{exp_no}
mapper.insert: insert into experience(userid, exp_no, exp_start, exp_end) values(#{userid}, exp_sq.nextval, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.delete: delete from experience where userid= #{userid} and exp_no=${exp_no}
